title: Charles Oakley interview and more
itunes:title: Charles Oakley interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had basketball legend Charles Oakely stop by for the first time, where he spoke about his new book, slapping Charles Barkley, rivalries, real NBA GOATs and more. Also, after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that had too much road rage while driving, we opened the phone lines to see if any of our listeners needed work on their road rage as well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
